subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The 2011 Tour de France will start with a flat stage in the Vendée region on the western coast of France known for the Vendee Globe sailing race.
snippet: The 2011 Tour de France will start with a flat stage in the Vendée region on the western coast of France known for the Vendee Globe sailing race.
